Duty makes us do things well, but love makes us do them beautifully.
Fear is your worst enemy. Risk is your best friend.

He who knows, does not speak. He who speaks, does not know.

It's not about what it is, it's about what it can become.
Opportunity comes when you continually push forward.
Worry is a waste of emotional reserve.

How to get more opportunity: Create more opportunity for others.
Unless a man is master of his soul, all other kinds of mastery amount to little.
Absurdity is the ecstasy of intellectualism.
Enjoy life. There's plenty of time to be dead.
Curiosity is the most powerful thing you own. Imagination is a force that can actually manifest a reality.
Be a master of change rather than a victim of change.
Empty yourself of everything - let the mind become still.
What have you done today to make someone else happy?
If you pray for rain, be prepared to deal with some mud.
Everybody's life is either rewarding or an example.
Either write something worth reading or do something worth writing.
Anyone telling you it's pointless to share your perspective is sharing their perspective.
It is not as important how we start, but how we finish.
Truth is like most opinions - best unexpressed.
It is important to fight and fight again, and keep fighting, for only then can evil be kept at bay though never quite eradicated.
Every day may not be good, but there's something good in every day.
The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
If you run you stand a chance of losing, but if you don't run you've already lost.
The biggest room in the world is the room for improvement.

It doesn't matter what you do, only how well you do it.
